name: Super Huey 1 & 2 Airdrop
description:
In 1985, Cosmi stunned the gaming world with the first helicopter flight simulator for the Commodore 64, then followed it up with an amazing sequel. Now, the original groundbreaking series returns together in one package!

Super Huey™ UH-IX

You’re all signed up to test out the Super Huey™ UH-IX – a new, experimental high performance helicopter! The in-flight computer will teach you the intricacies of rotary wing aviation. Then, you can test your high flying skills with challenges of solo flight, exploration, rescue, and even combat!

Super Huey™ II

So you think you’ve mastered flying the Super Huey™? Think again! Super Huey™ II pushes your flying skills to the limit over six intense scenarios. Chase down a stolen UH-IX before it can destroy all the bases in the area, fight intense fires, mount a desperate rescue in the frozen Arctic, and more! Do you have what it takes to become the best pilot?

  • Pilot an experimental helicopter in the original iconic 8-bit helicopter simulation.
  • Save your game at any time, then pick up where you left off with quick load or the save slot feature in the custom launcher.
  • Play a faithful emulation of the game true to original hardware, plus the ability to speed up the game or load screens at any time.
  • Enjoy the mixture of simulation and arcade-style gameplay which has you tackling exciting missions that test your mettle!
  • Original documentation and new Quick Start guides are included.
